newsitem.title: RUSSIA: Unions vow not to seek cabinet resignation-Tass.
newsitem.headline: Unions vow not to seek cabinet resignation-Tass.

text.p: Russian trade union leaders promised on Tuesday not to demand the resignation of the reshuffled government during their planned nationwide protest on March 27, Itar-Tass news agency said.
Tass quoted Labour Minister Alexander Melikyan as saying the promise was made during talks between the union leaders and Prime Minister Viktor Chernomyrdin.
Union leaders could not be immediately reached for comment.
Trade unions called the protest action to demand urgent measures to end chronic delays in wages and pension, which are stoking social tension.
On Monday Yeltsin signed a decree dramatically reshaping the government and putting some reformist ministers in top cabinet positions.
